description.text: The purpose of “Sector Class Fixed” is not only to overlay what you selected layer also to minimize exposure change of sector between original Portfolio and Overlaid Portfolio
The purpose of “Asset Class Fixed” is not only to overlay what you selected layer also to minimize exposure change of Asset Class between original Portfolio and Overlaid Portfolio
The purpose of “Factor Fixed” is not only to overlay what you selected layer also to minimize sensitivity change of each factor between original Portfolio and Overlaid Portfolio
Only reflecting constraints from Layer configuration you input
